member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.RoleController.GetRoles
member.summary: Gets all roles in Trifolia
member.permission: Only administrators are permitted

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.RoleController.AssignRoleSecurableAction(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Assgns the specified securable to the role Both role and securable must exist.
member.permission: Only administrators are permitted

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.RoleController.UnassignRoleSecurableAction(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a securable from the specified role. Both role and securable must exist.
member.permission: Only administrators are permitted

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.RoleController.AddRole(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new role with the specified name.
member.permission: Only administrators are permitted

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.RoleController.RemoveRole(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the specified role Expects that a valid role is specified.
member.permission: Only administrators are permitted

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.RoleController.RestrictOrganizations(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates the organization restrictions for a given role. Role must be specified. Any organization passed in via the model is checked to determine if it should be added or removed as a restriction.
member.permission: Only administrators are permitted

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.RoleController.UnrestrictOrganization(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the restriction on the specified organization from the specified role
member.param: The id of the role to remove the organization restriction from
The id of the organization
member.permission: Only administrators are permitted

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.RoleController.UpdateDefaultRole(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Set the default role to the role specified in the roleId parameter. First removes the default flag from all roles, then sets the flag for the one specified (or none, if null is provided).
member.param: If specified, the role to set as the new default.
member.permission: Only administrators are permitted

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.RoleController.GetClientConfig(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets configuration information used by the client-side application

member.summary: Searches for users

member.summary: Gets the specified group, including managers and members

member.summary: Gets all of the groups that the user manages or is a member of

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.GroupController.AddUserToMyGroup(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds a user to the specified group as either a manager or member.
member.param: The id of the group to add the user to
The id of the user to add to the group
Whether or not to add the user as a manager of the group
member.exception: You are not a member of this group

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.GroupController.RemoveUserFromMyGroup(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes a user from the specified group
member.param: The id of the group to remove the user from
The id of the user to remove from the group
Whether or not to remove the user as a manager
member.exception: You are not a manager of this group
Cannot remove yourself as a manager from the group

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.GroupController.AddMyGroup(Trifolia.Web.Models.Group.MyGroupModel)
member.summary: Creates a new group. The current user is automatically added as a manager of the group. Members and managers of the model are not created as part of this operation.
member.param: Information about the group to create

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.GroupController.UpdateMyGroup(System.Int32,Trifolia.Web.Models.Group.MyGroupModel)
member.summary: Updates the specified group based on the information passed in the body/model.

Information about the group to update

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.GroupController.GetGroups(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets all groups
member.param: Indicates that only groups the current user is not a member of should be returned

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.GroupController.SaveMyGroup(Trifolia.Web.Models.Group.GroupModel)
member.summary: Creates or updates a group based on the body/model specified Updates require an Id to be specified in the model Responds with the id of the group that was created/updated
member.param: Information about the group to create/update

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.GroupController.DeleteGroup(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the specified group
member.param: The id of the group to delete

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.GroupController.LeaveGroup(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the current user from the specified group
member.param: The id of the group to be removed from

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.GroupController.JoinGroup(System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempts to join the current user to the specified group. If the user is already a member of the group, nothing is done. If the group is also a manager of the group, the user is added as a member. If the group requires approval to join, an email is sent to the managers of the group. If the group is open for anyone to join, the user is added as a member of the group.
member.param: The id of the group for the current user to join

Specifies the name of the implementation guide to search for. Implementation guides whose name *contains* this value will be returned.

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.ImplementationGuideController.GetImplementationGuideValueSets(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets all value sets for the given implementation guide.
member.param: The ID of the implementation guide

Defaults to true, if not specified. When true, returns ONLY value sets that are statically bound to constraints in the implementation guide. When false, returns all value sets regardless of the static binding.
member.returns: A list of all value sets, including id, name, oid, and binding date

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.ImplementationGuideController.UserHasPermissions(Trifolia.DB.User,System.Collections.Generic.List{Trifolia.Web.Models.IGManagement.EditModel.Permission})
member.summary: Ensures that in the permissions list provided, the current user shows up as either a direct permissions to the user, permitted via a group, or permitted via the entire organization.
member.exception: Throws an exception if the user is not part of the list, which is intended to be handled in the calling method.

member.summary: Gets all organizations in Trifolia

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.TemplateController.GetTemplateConstraints(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a hierarchy of all constraints for the specified template, including basic details for the constraint (such as id, context, conformance, cardinality, etc.)
member.param: The id of the template

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.TemplateController.FindId(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the internal identifier of a template/profile by the identifier
member.param: The identifier of the template/profile to search for
member.returns: System.Nullable<System.Int32>: Returns null/nothing if no template/profile is found. Otherwise, returns the internal Trifolia id (integer) of the template/profile.

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.API.TemplateController.GetTemplates(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String)
member.summary: Searches for templates and returns basic meta-data about the templates
member.param: The number of templates to return per page
The page number
The property to sort the results by. Possible values are: "Name", "Oid", "Organization", "TemplateType", "ImplementationGuide"
When true, sorts the results descending (z-a)
String to search the entire template for (including constraint numbers). Searches template's description, name, bookmark, etc.
Matches the string specified by filterName specifically to the name of the template. Only templates with a name containing this value will be returned.
Matches the string specified by filterOid specifically to the oid (identifier) of the template. Only templates with an oid (identifier) containing this value will be returned.
Matches the id of the implementation guide specifically to the implementation guide of the template. Only templates that are used by the specified implementation guide will be returned.
Matches the id of the template type specified specifically to the template type of the template. Only templates with a matching type will be returned.
Matches the id of the organization specified specifically to the organization of the template. Only templates with a matching organization will be returned.
Matches the context specified specifically to the context of the template. Only templates whose context type contain the specified value will be returned.

member.summary: Converts the TemplateMetaDataModel into the Template (EF) model.

member.summary: Converts ConstraintModel into TemplateConstraint (EF) models.

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.ExportController.BeforeExport(Trifolia.DB.ImplementationGuide,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the authenticated user is from the HL7 organization. If yes, a redirect ActionResult is returned that forwards the user to the HL7 disclaimer page. The action result includes a redirectUrl parameter that tells HL7 to redirect the user back to trifolia. The redirectUrl parameter of the returned ActionResult includes the retAction passed to this method and an implementationGuideId param for the ig.

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.PermissionExtension.MemberType(Trifolia.DB.ImplementationGuidePermission)
member.summary: Converts the "Type" property of ImplementationGuidePermission to the PermissionTypes enum used by the PermissionManagement model

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Controllers.PermissionExtension.PrimaryId(Trifolia.DB.ImplementationGuidePermission)
member.summary: Returns a single Id based on the type of the permission.
member.returns: Returns OrganizationId when type is "EntireOrganization", GroupId when type is "Group" and "UserId" when type is "User"

member.summary: Models used to define settings for exporting to MS Word

member.summary: List of template ids included in the export

member.name: P:Trifolia.Web.Models.Export.MSWordSettingsModel.ImplementationGuideId
member.summary: The id of the implementation guide being exported

member.name: P:Trifolia.Web.Models.Export.MSWordSettingsModel.TemplateSortOrder
member.summary: Indicates the sort order of the templates exported

member.summary: Indicates what appendix tables should be included in the export

member.summary: Indicates what tables should be included for each template

member.name: P:Trifolia.Web.Models.Export.MSWordSettingsModel.IncludeXmlSample
member.summary: True to include samples in the export

member.name: P:Trifolia.Web.Models.Export.MSWordSettingsModel.IncludeChangeList
member.summary: True if the export should include a table of changes. Only affects exports where the IG is a new version.

member.name: P:Trifolia.Web.Models.Export.MSWordSettingsModel.IncludeTemplateStatus
member.summary: True if the status of templates should be included in the export

member.name: P:Trifolia.Web.Models.Export.MSWordSettingsModel.GenerateValuesets
member.summary: True if value sets should be included in the export

member.name: P:Trifolia.Web.Models.Export.MSWordSettingsModel.MaximumValuesetMembers
member.summary: Default number of maximum members to be used for value set exports

member.summary: True if value sets should be exported in an appendix

member.name: P:Trifolia.Web.Models.Export.MSWordSettingsModel.IncludeNotes
member.summary: True if notes on templates and constraints should be included in the export

member.name: P:Trifolia.Web.Models.Export.MSWordSettingsModel.ValueSetOid
member.summary: List of value set identifiers included in this IG. Primarily used for the ValueSetMaxMembers property's order.

member.name: P:Trifolia.Web.Models.Export.MSWordSettingsModel.ValueSetMaxMembers
member.summary: List of numbers representing the maximum number of members that should be exported for each value set. The order of this list matches the order of the ValueSetOid list.

member.name: P:Trifolia.Web.Models.Export.MSWordSettingsModel.SaveAsDefaultSettings
member.summary: Whether these settings should be remembered as default settings for future exports. Only editors of the IG can save default settings.

member.name: P:Trifolia.Web.Models.Export.MSWordSettingsModel.ParentTemplateIds
member.summary: List of parent template IDs used to filter templates. Only templates that are used by these selected parent templates are included in the export

member.summary: Indicates if inferred templates should be included

member.remarks: Although the underlying model allows us to link a user to many organizations, this view model represents a single organization, and therefore in this context, a user either belongs to the current organization or not.

member.summary: Overloaded version of UserHasSecurable(string[]) for checking a single securable

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.SecurableForm.UserHasSecurable(System.String[])
member.summary: Determines if the authenticated user has a role associated with the named securable.
member.param: The name(s) of the securable to check.
member.returns: Returns false if a user is not logged in. Return true if the authenticated user has a role associated with the requested securable, otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:Trifolia.Web.Filters.SecurableAuthorizationFilter.AuditLogin
member.summary: Checks if the authenticated user has a "Login" audit within the last 24 hours. If not, creates a Login audit.
member.remarks: When user is logged in via "remember me", Login does not have to occur.
